sentences.en: " You're all so docile. You don't put up the slightest resistance.
sentences.cn: “ 你们总是忍受, 你们一点也不反抗.

sentences.en: Aunt Tamara was docile , girlish, sensitive, impulsive.
sentences.cn: 塔玛拉姑妈贤淑, 敏感, 女孩子气,很容易冲动.

sentences.en: But she is quick and quiet, docile and clever, sings well, and is of good blood.
sentences.cn: 不过她机灵而娴静, 温顺而又聪明, 还会唱歌, 出身好.

sentences.en: Circus monkeys are trained to be very docile and obedient.
sentences.cn: 马戏团的猴子训练得服服贴贴的.

sentences.en: He looked all right – middle - aged , docile features, trustworthy.
sentences.cn: 他看上去不错, 中年, 相貌老实可信.

sentences.en: No longer a good man a docile kid  a listener.
sentences.cn: 以后不做好人,不做乖小孩,不做倾听者.

sentences.en: She habitually bore herself with strange alternations of cool reserve and docile respect to the man.
sentences.cn: 她向来对这个人的态度总是很不正常,一会儿对他冷淡矜持,一会儿对他温顺尊敬.

sentences.en: She was excellently, imperturbably good; affectionate, docile, obedient , and much addicted to speaking the truth.
sentences.cn: 她绝对善良, 脾气也好到了极点; 温柔 、 谦和 、 恭顺一贯爱说真话.

sentences.en: The fault is mine, I should docile you're saying the same year.
sentences.cn: 我错了, 我当年不该不听您的话.

sentences.en: The most docile animal was originally the rabbit and lamb.
sentences.cn: 最温驯的动物原来是兔子和小羊.

sentences.en: The soldiers were grateful and docile, made almost childlike by their wounds.
sentences.cn: 士兵们都很感激,很听话, 因为受伤,都变得象孩子似的.

sentences.en: Their unions, once ineffective and docile , are now powerful tools in the collective bargaining process.
sentences.cn: 他们的工会, 过去曾经是无能为力的和驯服的, 而今是集体交涉中有力的工具.

sentences.en: They gather about themselves their protective shells of electrons, and become docile neutral atoms.
sentences.cn: 它们将其保护性的电子壳层在其周围集合起来, 而变成易于对待的中性原子.

sentences.en: They wanted a low-cost, docile workforce.
sentences.cn: 他们想要廉价的、听话的劳动力。

trans.tran_cn: 温顺的，驯服的，易驾驭的，驯化
